languages.text: "Хочется чего-то более изысканного? Как насчет близкого знакомства с этой вашей... Энергией проводящего разряда?" {n}Друкари подцепляет когтем провод светильника.{/n}
"Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хочется чего-то более изысканного? Как насчет близкого знакомства с этой вашей... Энергией проводящего разряда?" {n}Друкари подцепляет когтем провод светильника.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... Motive Force of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... Motive Force of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, vous préféreriez donc quelque chose de plus sophistiqué ? Et si je vous aidais à faire intimement connaissance avec cette... "charge conductrice", comme vous l'appelez ? » {n}demande le Drukhari en enroulant un doigt autour du fil d'une lampe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vous préféreriez donc quelque chose de plus sophistiqué ? Et si je vous aidais à faire intimement connaissance avec cette... Force Motrice, comme vous l'appelez ? » {n}demande le Drukhari en enroulant un doigt autour du fil d'une lampe.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, ¿prefieres algo más sofisticado? ¿Qué tal si te familiarizas un poco con esa... "carga conductiva" tuya?». {n}El Drukhari sostiene el cable de una lámpara con su garra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ah, ¿prefieres algo más sofisticado? ¿Qué tal si te familiarizas un poco con esa... Fuerza Motriz tuya?». {n}El Drukhari sostiene el cable de una lámpara con su garra.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “啊，也就是说，你渴望更复杂的体验？不如更深入地了解一下你们所谓的……电力，怎么样？”{n}玛拉斋伸出利爪，勾住了电灯的电线。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊，也就是说，你渴望更复杂的体验？不如更深入地了解一下你们所谓的……源力，怎么样？”{n}玛拉斋伸出利爪，勾住了电灯的电线。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「もっと洗練されたものを求めているのか？お前の言うこの『伝導電荷』についてもっとよく知りたいとは思わないか？」{n}デュカーリがランプのコードに爪を引っ掛ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もっと洗練されたものがお望みですか？これらを深く知るのはどうでしょう…もっと、動力に近いもの…」{n}デュカーリがランプのコードに爪を引っ掛ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, Euch steht der Sinn also nach etwas Raffinierterem? Wie wäre es, wenn wir Euch ein wenig näher mit Eurer ... Leitenden Entladung vertraut machen?" {n}Der Drukhari legt eine Kralle um ein Lampenkabel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Euch steht der Sinn also nach etwas Raffinierterem? Wie wäre es, wenn wir Euch ein wenig näher mit Eurer ... Antriebskraft vertraut machen?" {n}Der Drukhari legt eine Kralle um ein Lampenkabel.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ha, daha sofistike bir şey mi arzuluyorsun? Peki şu senin... 'İletken yükün' ile daha fazla haşır neşir olmaya ne dersin?" {n}Drukhari, pençelerinin birini bir lamba kablosuna asıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, so you crave something more sophisticated? What about becoming more closely acquainted with this... 'conductive charge' of yours?" {n}The Drukhari hooks a claw around a lamp cord.{/n}
